project.description: A sample test job with multiple test cases

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "[INFO] Starting build process..." echo "[INFO] Checking environment..." echo "[DEBUG] JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME" echo "[DEBUG] PATH=$PATH" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: LoginTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Initializing test environment..." echo "[DEBUG] Loading test configuration" echo "[INFO] Running LoginTest..." echo "[INFO] Step 1: Navigate to login page" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Enter username" echo "[INFO] Step 3: Enter password" echo "[INFO] Step 4: Click submit" echo "[INFO] Step 5: Verify dashboard loaded" echo "[INFO] LoginTest completed successfully" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [LoginTest]: PASSED" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: UserRegistrationTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Running UserRegistrationTest..." echo "[DEBUG] Generating random user data" echo "[INFO] Step 1: Navigate to registration" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Fill form fields" echo "[WARN] Email field has weak validation" echo "[INFO] Step 3: Submit registration" echo "[INFO] Step 4: Check confirmation email" echo "[INFO] UserRegistrationTest completed" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [UserRegistrationTest]: PASSED" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: PaymentProcessingTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Running PaymentProcessingTest..." echo "[DEBUG] Initializing payment gateway mock" echo "[INFO] Step 1: Add items to cart" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Proceed to checkout" echo "[ERROR] Payment gateway timeout after 30s" echo "[ERROR] Connection refused: payment.example.com:443" echo "[ERROR] PaymentProcessingTest FAILED" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [PaymentProcessingTest]: ERROR" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: SearchFunctionalityTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Running SearchFunctionalityTest..." echo "[DEBUG] Indexing test data" echo "[INFO] Step 1: Perform basic search" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Verify results count" echo "[INFO] Step 3: Test pagination" echo "[WARN] Search performance degraded (>500ms)" echo "[INFO] Step 4: Test filters" echo "[INFO] SearchFunctionalityTest completed" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [SearchFunctionalityTest]: PASSED" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: AdminDashboardTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Running AdminDashboardTest..." echo "[DEBUG] Logging in as admin user" echo "[INFO] Step 1: Load admin dashboard" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Check user statistics" echo "[INFO] Step 3: Verify system health" echo "[DEBUG] CPU: 45%, Memory: 2.1GB/4GB" echo "[INFO] AdminDashboardTest completed" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [AdminDashboardTest]: PASSED" sleep 1
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "Starting TestCase: APIIntegrationTest" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Running APIIntegrationTest..." echo "[DEBUG] Setting up API client" echo "[INFO] Step 1: Test GET /api/users" echo "[INFO] Step 2: Test POST /api/users" echo "[ERROR] Unexpected response code: 500" echo "[ERROR] Response body: {\"error\": \"Internal Server Error\"}" echo "[ERROR] APIIntegrationTest FAILED" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [APIIntegrationTest]: ERROR"
echo "" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] TEST EXECUTION SUMMARY" echo "[INFO] ============================================" echo "[INFO] Total Tests: 6" echo "[INFO] Passed: 4" echo "[ERROR] Failed: 2" echo "[WARN] Build status: UNSTABLE"
# Exit with failure to mark build as unstable exit 1
